"studentRefund": { "bankAccountCheckDigit": "12345", "bankAccountNumber": "12345678", "bankBranchCheckDigit": "123", "bankAccountType": "Checking", "bankName": "Super Bank", "branchName": "Super Branch", "branchNumber": "54321", "returnType": "BankAccountDeposit", "refundTo": "Student" }, "studentDataUpdate": { "currentIdentification": { "person": { "SocialName": "", "FullLegalName": "" }, "nonPerson": { "name": "name" } }, "address": { "addressType": "address type", "postalCode": "postal code", "street": "street", "number": "number", "complement": "complement", "neighborhood": "neighborhood", "city": "city", "country": "country", "stateOrProvince": "State Or Province", "nation": "nation" }, "biographicalInformation": { "gender": "gender", "birthDate": "BirthDate", "citizenship": "Citizenship", "maritalStatus": "Marital Status", "cpf": "cpf", "cnpj": "cnpj", "rg": "rg", "emitingState": "Emiting State", "emitingEntity": "Emiting Entity", "issueDateRg": "Issue Date Rg", "disabilities": "", "fatherFullName": "Father Full Name", "motherFullName": "Mother Full Name", "fatherEducation": "Father Education", "motherEducation": "Mother Education" }, con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response=messageExchange.response.responseContent; def json1= new JsonSlurper().parseText(response); // verifying the datatypes for all the records assert json1.guid instanceof String assert json1.institutionId instanceof String assert json1.studentID instanceof String assert json1.generalRegistrationID instanceof String assert json1.cpfId instanceof String assert json1.firstName instanceof String assert json1.lastName instanceof String assert json1.institution[0].institutionBrandId instanceof String assert json1.institution[0].institutionStatus instanceof String assert json1.studentimage instanceof String

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response=messageExchange.response.responseContent; def json1= new JsonSlurper().parseText(response); // verifying the datatypes for all the records assert json1.guid instanceof String assert json1.institutionId instanceof String assert json1.studentID instanceof String assert json1.generalRegistrationID instanceof String assert json1.cpfId instanceof String assert json1.firstName instanceof String assert json1.lastName instanceof String assert json1.institution[0].institutionBrandId instanceof String assert json1.institution[0].institutionStatus instanceof String assert json1.studentimage instanceof String

con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT spriden_id AS "ra", spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_last_name AS "nome", goremal_email_address AS "email", sorlcur_vpdi_code AS "empresaId", sorlcur_program AS "cursoCodigo", sorlcur_camp_code AS "campusCodigo", spbpers_rg_cde AS "numeroRG", spbpers_stat_code_rg AS "ufEmissaoRG", spbpers_entity_rg_cde AS "dtEmissaoRG", spbpers_sex AS "Sexo", TO_CHAR(spbpers_birth_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dtNascimento", svrbadr_street AS "endereco", svrbadr_number AS "enderecoNumero", svrbadr_complement_addr AS "enderecoComplemento", svrbadr_zip AS "cep", svrtele_phone_area || '-' || svrtele_phone_number AS "telefone", k.nomer AS "nmResponsavel", spbpers_cpf_id AS "numeroCPF", 'N' AS "percentualFies", 'N' AS "percentualProUni", DECODE(sfrensp_ests_code,'EL',0,'TR',2,1) AS "status", sfrensp_ests_date AS "dtMatricula", spriden_id AS "usuarioID", gobtpac_pin AS "Senha", svrbadr_neighborhood AS "bairro", svrbadr_city AS "cidade", svrbadr_stat_code AS "uf", spbpers_citz_code AS "Nacionalidade", spbpers_mrtl_code AS "estadoCivil", sfrensp_term_code AS "periodoLetivo" FROM saturn.spriden left JOIN saturn.spbpers ON ( spbpers_pidm = spriden_pidm ) INNER JOIN saturn.sorlcur ON ( spriden_pidm = sorlcur_pidm ) INNER JOIN saturn.sfrensp ON ( sfrensp_pidm = spriden_pidm ) LEFT JOIN general.goremal ON ( spriden_pidm = goremal_pidm AND goremal_emal_code = 'PESS' ) LEFT JOIN gobtpac ON ( gobtpac_pidm = spriden_pidm ) LEFT JOIN saturn.svrbadr ON ( svrbadr_pidm = spriden_pidm ) LEFT JOIN saturn.svrtele ON ( svrtele_pidm = spriden_pidm ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT svrxref_pidm, s.spriden_first_name ||+' ' || s.spriden_last_name AS nomer FROM saturn.spriden s, saturn.svrxref WHERE svrxref_xref_pidm = s.spriden_pidm ) k ON ( spriden_pidm = svrxref_pidm ) WHERE substr(sfrensp_term_code,1,5) =20181 AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT alib.smralib_atts_code AS "Codigo", paap.smrpaap_area_priority AS "Serie", pgen.smbpgen_program AS "cursoCodigo" FROM smbpgen pgen, smrpaap paap, smralib alib WHERE pgen.smbpgen_program = paap.smrpaap_program AND pgen.smbpgen_term_code_eff = paap.smrpaap_term_code_eff AND paap.smrpaap_area = alib.smralib_area AND alib.smralib_atts_code IS NOT NULL AND pgen.smbpgen_active_ind = 'Y'

SELECT distinct smrprle_program AS "codigo", smrprle_program_desc AS "descricao", smrprle_coll_code AS "escolaCodigo", smrprle_levl_code AS "nivelEnsinoCodigo", decode(SUBSTR(smrprle_coll_code,1,1),'F','FMU','I','FIAM FAAM') AS "siglaIES", decode(svrprci_insm_code,'ONLIN',2,'PRESE',1,3) AS "modalidade" FROM smrprle left JOIN svrprci ON ( smrprle_program = svrprci_program )
SELECT stvterm_code, stvterm_desc, stvterm_fa_proc_yr || stvterm_fa_term FROM stvterm

con:testSuite.name: 6524_TestSuite_GetTipology_FMU

con:config.con:query: SELECT stvcoll_code, gorguid_guid, stvcoll_desc, gorguid_ldm_name FROM gorguid, stvcoll WHERE stvcoll_code = gorguid_domain_key AND gorguid_ldm_name = 'colleges'

con:testSuite.name: 7892 GetClassSchedule_UAM

con:config.con:query: SELECT SOBCURR_PROGRAM AS "CURSO", SOBCURR_CAMP_CODE AS "CAMPUS", SORCMJR_DEPT_CODE AS "TURNO" , SMRPRLE_DEGC_CODE AS "HABILITACAO", SMRPRLE_LEVL_CODE AS "TIPOCURSO", SVRPRCI_INSM_CODE AS MODALIDADE FROM SOBCURR, SORCMJR, SMRPRLE, SVRPRCI WHERE SOBCURR_CURR_RULE = SORCMJR_CURR_RULE AND SOBCURR_PROGRAM = SMRPRLE_PROGRAM AND SOBCURR_CURR_RULE = SVRPRCI_CURR_RULE(+)

SELECT b_student.spriden_first_name studentFirstName, b_student.spriden_mi studentMiddleName, b_student.spriden_last_name studentLastName, d_student.goremal_email_address studentEmailAddress, student_add.spraddr_street_line1 studentStreetAddress, student_add.SPRADDR_city studentCity, student_add.SPRADDR_stat_code studentState, student_add.SPRADDR_zip studentZipCode, student_add.SPRADDR_cnty_code studentCounty, student_add.SPRADDR_natn_code studentCountry, c_student.spbpers_cpf_id studentCPF, a.svrxref_pidm financialRespPIDM, b_financialres.spriden_first_name financialRespFirstName, b_financialres.spriden_mi financialRespMiddleName, b_financialres.spriden_last_name financialRespLastName, financialparty_add.spraddr_street_line1 financialRespStreetAddress, financialparty_add.SPRADDR_city financialRespCity, financialparty_add.SPRADDR_stat_code financialRespState, financialparty_add.SPRADDR_zip financialRespZipCode, financialparty_add.SPRADDR_cnty_code financialRespCounty, financialparty_add.SPRADDR_natn_code financialRespCountry, c_fincres.spbpers_cpf_id financialRespCPF FROM svrxref a, spriden b_student, SPRADDR student_add, SPRADDR financialparty_add, spriden b_financialres, goremal d_student,--, spbpers c_student, spbpers c_fincres WHERE a.svrxref_xref_code(+) = '001' AND b_student.spriden_change_ind is NULL AND b_student.spriden_pidm = a.svrxref_pidm(+) AND c_student.spbpers_pidm = b_student.spriden_pidm AND b_student.spriden_pidm=student_add.SPRADDR_pidm AND d_student.goremal_pidm(+) = b_student.spriden_pidm AND b_financialres.spriden_pidm(+) = a.svrxref_xref_pidm AND c_fincres.spbpers_pidm(+) = b_financialres.spriden_pidm AND b_financialres.spriden_pidm=financialparty_add.SPRADDR_pidm(+) AND student_add.SPRADDR_atyp_code(+)='BI' AND student_add.SPRADDR_status_ind is null AND financialparty_add.SPRADDR_atyp_code(+)='BI' AND financialparty_add.SPRADDR_status_ind is null and b_student.spriden_pidm='30086'
SELECT stvsbgi_code AS "CodigoInstituicaoEnsinoLocal", stvsbgi_desc AS "Nome", stvsbgi_type_ind AS "TipoInstituicao" FROM stvsbgi

con:testCase.name: InstitutionId TestCase_validation
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [InstitutionId] located at [/ic/api/integration/v1/flows/rest/GET_SERVIC_CATALO_FROM_VBCS/1.0/getServiceCatalog/{institutionId}]

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response=messageExchange.response.responseContent; def json1= new JsonSlurper().parseText(response); def lenth=json1.data.size() ; log.info len // verifying the datatypes for all the records for(int i=0;i<lenth;i++) // verifying the datatypes for all the records { assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].activeFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].caseType instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].caseCategory instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].caseSubCategory instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].serviceCatalogGUID instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].InstitutionId instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].serviceName instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].financialHoldRestrictionFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].nonFinancialHoldCodes instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].feeRequiredFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].prepayFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].initialCaseStatus instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].currency instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].deliveryType instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].nonFinHoldRestrictionFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].highPriorityFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].autoDocgenFlag instanceof String assert json1.serviceCatalogDetails[i].caseNeededFlag instanceof String }

con:config.con:query: SELECT slbrdef_room_number, slbrdef_desc, slrbcat_desc, slbrdef_maximum_capacity, slbrdef_bldg_code, slbrdef_rrcd_code, stvrrcd_desc FROM slbrdef, slrbcat, stvrrcd WHERE slbrdef_rrcd_code = stvrrcd_code (+) AND slbrdef_bldg_code = slrbcat_bldg_code (+)
SELECT max(excl.ssrexcl_desc) Description, excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date Holiday FROM ssrexcl EXCL WHERE EXCL.SSREXCL_YEAR= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date ORDER BY 2
SELECT max(excl.ssrexcl_desc) Description, excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date Holiday FROM ssrexcl EXCL WHERE EXCL.SSREXCL_YEAR= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date ORDER BY 2
SELECT max(excl.ssrexcl_desc) Description, excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date Holiday FROM ssrexcl EXCL WHERE EXCL.SSREXCL_YEAR= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY excl.ssrexcl_exclude_date ORDER BY 2
select Distinct S.STVDEGC_CODE,S.STVDEGC_DESC,T.smrprle_program from STVDEGC S, SMRPRLE T where (T.SMRPRLE_DEGC_CODE=S.STVDEGC_CODE)

con:restRequest.con:request: { "institutionId": "FMU", "studentId": "DEMO111", "caseServiceGUID": "SADF12323434456345", "initialCaseStatus": "Active", "serviceFee": "2", "detailCode": "1001", "program": "PR01", "programId": "PR1009", "major": "science", "majorId": "1", "campus": "CMP", "campusId": "CP010", "shift": "SFT_01", "shiftId": "SHFT_001", "term": "TERM1", "termid": "TERM01", brazil,portuguse", "updpersAddressNeighborhood": "msmstreet", "updpersAddressCity": "rio de janerio", "updpersAddressCountry": "no:21 43323", "updpersAddressStateOrProvince": "", con:config.con:query:
SELECT distinct prle.smrprle_program AS "cursoCodigo", prle.smrprle_degc_code AS "habilitacaoCodigo", acaa.smracaa_rule AS "disciplinaCodigo", barul.smbarul_desc AS "descricao", paap.smrpaap_area_priority AS "serie", '1' AS modalidadecodigo, ( CASE WHEN nvl(ch_pratica.ch,0) <= 0 AND nvl(ch_teorica.ch,0) > 0 THEN 1 WHEN nvl(ch_pratica.ch,0) > 0 AND nvl(ch_teorica.ch,0) <= 0 THEN 2 WHEN nvl(ch_pratica.ch,0) > 0 AND nvl(ch_teorica.ch,0) > 0 THEN 3 WHEN nvl(ch_pratica.ch,0) <= 0 AND nvl(ch_teorica.ch,0) <= 0 THEN 3 END ) AS "disciplinaTipo", DECODE(curr_preaim.program,NULL,1,2) matriz_tipo, ( CASE WHEN acaa.smracaa_rule LIKE 'OPTATIVA%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "optativaTipo", barul.smbarul_req_cred_cond "cargaHorariaTotal", nvl(ch_pratica.ch,0) "cargaHorariaPratica", nvl(ch_teorica.ch,0) "cargaHorariaTeorica", acaa.smracaa_rule AS "grupoCodigo", 0 "bloco" FROM saturn.smrprle prle, saturn.smbpgen pgen, saturn.smrpaap paap, saturn.smracaa acaa, saturn.smbarul barul, saturn.smrarul rarul, ( SELECT schd.scrschd_subj_code || schd.scrschd_crse_numb key_rule, schd.scrschd_workload ch FROM saturn.scrschd schd WHERE schd.scrschd_schd_code = 'PR' AND schd.scrschd_eff_term = ( SELECT MAX(scrschd_eff_term) FROM saturn.scrschd WHERE scrschd_subj_code = schd.scrschd_subj_code AND scrschd_crse_numb = schd.scrschd_crse_numb AND scrschd_schd_code = schd.scrschd_schd_code ) ) ch_pratica, ( SELECT schd.scrschd_subj_code || schd.scrschd_crse_numb key_rule, schd.scrschd_workload ch FROM saturn.scrschd schd WHERE schd.scrschd_schd_code = 'TE' AND schd.scrschd_eff_term = ( SELECT MAX(scrschd_eff_term) FROM saturn.scrschd WHERE scrschd_subj_code = schd.scrschd_subj_code AND scrschd_crse_numb = schd.scrschd_crse_numb AND scrschd_schd_code = schd.scrschd_schd_code ) ) ch_teorica, ( SELECT pcmt.smrpcmt_program program, pcmt.smrpcmt_term_code_eff term_ctlg FROM saturn.smrpcmt pcmt WHERE pcmt.smrpcmt_prnt_code = 'PREAIM' ) curr_preaim WHERE smrprle_program = pgen.smbpgen_program AND smbpgen_term_code_eff = ( SELECT MAX(s2.smbpgen_term_code_eff) FROM saturn.smbpgen s2, saturn.stvterm term WHERE s2.smbpgen_program = smbpgen_program AND s2.smbpgen_term_code_eff <= term.stvterm_code AND term.stvterm_acyr_code ='2018' AND term.stvterm_fa_term ='1'
) AND pgen.smbpgen_program = paap.smrpaap_program AND pgen.smbpgen_term_code_eff = paap.smrpaap_term_code_eff AND paap.smrpaap_area = acaa.smracaa_area AND acaa.smracaa_term_code_eff = ( SELECT MAX(smracaa_term_code_eff) FROM saturn.smracaa WHERE smracaa_area = acaa.smracaa_area AND smracaa_term_code_eff <= paap.smrpaap_term_code_eff ) AND acaa.smracaa_area = barul.smbarul_area AND acaa.smracaa_term_code_eff = barul.smbarul_term_code_eff AND acaa.smracaa_rule = barul.smbarul_key_rule AND barul.smbarul_key_rule = rarul.smrarul_key_rule AND barul.smbarul_area = rarul.smrarul_area AND barul.smbarul_term_code_eff = rarul.smrarul_term_code_eff AND acaa.smracaa_rule = ch_pratica.key_rule (+) AND acaa.smracaa_rule = ch_teorica.key_rule (+) AND pgen.smbpgen_program = curr_preaim.program (+) AND pgen.smbpgen_term_code_eff = curr_preaim.term_ctlg (+)

SELECT distinct smrprle_program AS "codigo", smrprle_program_desc AS "descricao", smrprle_coll_code AS "escolaCodigo", smrprle_levl_code AS "nivelEnsinoCodigo", decode(SUBSTR(smrprle_coll_code,1,1),'F','FMU','I','FIAM FAAM') AS "siglaIES", decode(svrprci_insm_code,'ONLIN',2,'PRESE',1,3) AS "modalidade" FROM smrprle left JOIN svrprci ON ( smrprle_program = svrprci_program )

SELECT sfrrgfe_term_code as "CodigoIntakeLocal", sfrrgfe_type as "Tipo", sfrrgfe_seqno as "CodigoSequenceOferta", sfrrgfe_levl_code as "CodigoTipoCursoLocal", sfrrgfe_program as "CodigoCursoLocal", sfrrgfe_camp_code as "CodigoUnidadeEnsinoLocal", sfrrgfe_clas_code as "CodigoClassLocal", sfrrgfe_detl_code as "CodigoDetlLocal", sfrrgfe_atts_code as "CodigoAttsLocal", sfrrgfe_dept_code as "CodigoDeptLocal", sfrrgfe_flat_fee_amount as "PrecoMatricula" FROM sfrrgfe WHERE substr(SFRRGFE_TERM_CODE,1,5)=20181

SELECT DISTINCT CASE C.SSRMEET_SUN_DAY || C.SSRMEET_MON_DAY || C.SSRMEET_TUE_DAY || C.SSRMEET_WED_DAY || C.SSRMEET_THU_DAY || C.SSRMEET_FRI_DAY || C.SSRMEET_SAT_DAY WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'M' THEN 1 WHEN 'T' THEN 2 WHEN 'W' THEN 3 WHEN 'R' THEN 4 WHEN 'F' THEN 5 WHEN 'S' THEN 6 END AS DIA_SEMANA, C.SSRMEET_START_DATE, C.SSRMEET_END_DATE, nvl(A.SSBSECT_SESS_CODE, 0), C.SSRMEET_BEGIN_TIME, C.SSRMEET_END_TIME, A.SSBSECT_CAMP_CODE, nvl(C.SSRMEET_BLDG_CODE, 'not available'), nvl(C.SSRMEET_ROOM_CODE, 'not available'), nvl(F.SMRPRLE_PROGRAM, 0), A.SSBSECT_SUBJ_CODE || A.SSBSECT_CRSE_NUMB, C.SSRMEET_CRN, IDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM, IDEN2.SPRIDEN_PIDM, E.SIRASGN_CATEGORY, IDEN.SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' '||IDEN.SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME as name_student, IDEN2.SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' '||IDEN2.SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME as name_teacher FROM SSBSECT A LEFT JOIN SFRSTCR B ON A.SSBSECT_TERM_CODE = B.SFRSTCR_TERM_CODE AND A.SSBSECT_CRN = B.SFRSTCR_CRN LEFT JOIN SPRIDEN IDEN ON B.SFRSTCR_PIDM = IDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM LEFT JOIN SSRMEET C ON A.SSBSECT_TERM_CODE = C.SSRMEET_TERM_CODE AND A.SSBSECT_CRN = C.SSRMEET_CRN LEFT JOIN SIRASGN E ON A.SSBSECT_TERM_CODE = E.SIRASGN_TERM_CODE AND A.SSBSECT_CRN = E.SIRASGN_CRN LEFT JOIN SPRIDEN IDEN2 ON E.SIRASGN_PIDM = IDEN2.SPRIDEN_PIDM LEFT JOIN SMRPRLE F ON E.SIRASGN_PIDM = F.SMRPRLE_PIDM WHERE A.SSBSECT_SSTS_CODE='A' AND substr(A.SSBSECT_TERM_CODE,1,5) = 20182

con:testSuite.name: 12820_1_Create Case in Dynamics_Message request - Changes sent to Witsys
9814 Send Notification Via MooNotify - Student Withdrawal
